item.title: PARA
item.description: score:-1 Chances: Netflix (NFLX) and Disney (DIS) stocks soared to 52-week highs driven by the booming streaming industry. Ranganathan believes these stocks still possess ‘room to run.’ She highlights Netflix’s subscriber growth initiatives, such as combating password sharing and introducing ad-supported subscription tiers.
